humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is an invasive ductal carcinoma measuring 2.6 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma is 2.6 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T stage of T2 is assigned to tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not greater than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
